Song.title: This Glorious Grace
Song.copyright: Aaron Ivey, Brett Land, Kyle Lent

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [C Em D]
VERSE 1: God I [G]need You, I [C]need You, I [Em]need You Every [G]breath, every [C]pulse of my [D]heart Christ have [C]mercy, have [G/B]mercy, let [D]mercy [Em]abound I [C]need You, I [D]need You [G]now
CHORUS: God pour out Your [C]grace, glori[Em]ous [D]grace That I would [G/B]be [C]held by Your perfect [G D]embrace I am unde[Am]serving, You are high and [Em]worthy All of my [C]praise for this [D]glorious [G]grace
TURN: [C Em D C Em D]
VERSE 2: God I’m [G]longing, I’m [C]longing to [Em]see You In Your [G]presence all [C]darkness will [D]fade Shine Your [C]glory, Your [G/B]glory, let [D]glory [Em]surround I’m [C]longing to [D]see You [G]now
TURN: [C D Em G C D G]
{new_page} BRIDGE: [C]God [D]Your [Em]grace [G]like [C D]rising [G]seas Has [C D]swallowed [Em]death [G]and [C]sin [D]in [G]me [C D]Glory [Em]to [G]my [C]God [D]who [G]saves [C D]Jesus [Em]Christ, [G]my [C D]glorious [G]grace
VERSE 3: God I [G]worship, I [C]worship, I [Em]worship You For Your [G]glory, my [C]all in [D]all You are [C]worthy, You’re [G/B]worthy, You’re [D Em]worthy I [C]worship, I [D]worship [Em]You God I [C]need You, I [D]need You [G]now
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 god i need you i need you i need you every breath every pulse of my heart christ have mercy have mercy let mercy abound i need you i need you now chorus god pour out your grace glorious grace that i would be held by your perfect embrace i am undeserving you are high and worthy all of my praise for this glorious grace turn verse 2 god im longing im longing to see you in your presence all darkness will fade shine your glory your glory let glory surround im longing to see you now turn bridge god your grace like rising seas has swallowed death and sin in me glory to my god who saves jesus christ my glorious grace verse 3 god i worship i worship i worship you for your glory my all in all you are worthy youre worthy youre worthy i worship i worship you god i need you i need you now
